TopicTitle: .090 - Fullscreen not working in OpenGL mode

Articles.Content:
Using -force-opengl on the command-line, I can't switch between fullscreen and windowed with ALT-Enter anymore. When I go to fullscreen, I end up with a tiny, partial view of about VGA size, down in the lower left corner of the screen.

Problem went away when I removed that command-line option.

Thanks!

Sorry Beowolf, that switch is a Unity3D issue rather that Squads, you'd have to take this up with them on their forums.

There is no support for -force-opengl or -force-dx11
Try it, that at least should work, but if not then again, it's a Unity bug :/

Please tell me -popupwindow is still working...

Yes, -popupwindow still works. (And I personally recommend it, but that's beside the point. )

I do confirm that both OpenGL and -popupwindow works like a charm. And given that in previous versions OpenGL tended to be buggy if used in fullscreen, I don't even know why someone would use it without -popupwindow.
